claim-text.content: 1. A method comprising:
ascertaining a value for an option for a particular policy of a plurality of policies that are ranked in a priority order;
applying, by a node in a computer network, a variance to the value associated with the option for the particular policy to define a range of acceptable values for the particular policy;
determining, by the node, whether one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy; and
in response to the determining,
if no other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, selecting the option, and

if one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, repeating the ascertaining, applying and determining for a next lower priority policy of the plurality of policies to consider the one or more other options, the repeating to occur successively until an option is selected.

claim.body: each option is a path in the computer network and the plurality of policies are rules regarding selection of a best path.

content: , wherein each option is a path in the computer network and the plurality of policies are rules regarding selection of a best path.

claim.body: each path is a path to a particular destination prefix.

content: , wherein each path is a path to a particular destination prefix.

claim.body: the plurality of policies include one or more policies selected from the group consisting of: reachability, lowest round trip time, lowest packet loss, lowest cost, and lowest utilization.

content: , wherein the plurality of policies include one or more policies selected from the group consisting of: reachability, lowest round trip time, lowest packet loss, lowest cost, and lowest utilization.

claim.body:
further comprising:
if there is not another lower priority policy, selecting one of the one or more other options as the selected option.

claim-text.content: if there is not another lower priority policy, selecting one of the one or more other options as the selected option.

claim.body: one of the one or more other options as the selected option is by random selection.

content: , wherein selecting one of the one or more other options as the selected option is by random selection.

claim.body:
further comprising:
assigning a separate respective variance to each policy of the plurality of policies.

claim-text.content: assigning a separate respective variance to each policy of the plurality of policies.

claim.body:
further comprising:
assigning each of the plurality of policies a respective exclusive priority value to rank the plurality of policies in the priority order.

claim-text.content: assigning each of the plurality of policies a respective exclusive priority value to rank the plurality of policies in the priority order.

claim.body:
further comprising:
assigning the variance as a percentage value.

claim-text.content: assigning the variance as a percentage value.

claim.body: the node in the computer network is an Optimized Edge Router in the computer network.

content: , wherein the node in the computer network is an Optimized Edge Router in the computer network.

claim.body:
one or more network interfaces;
a processor coupled to the one or more network interfaces and configured to execute software processes; and
a memory configured store a decision making software process executable by the processor, the decision making software process configured to:
ascertain a value for an option for a particular policy of a plurality of policies that are ranked in a priority order,
apply a variance to the value associated with the option for the particular policy to define a range of acceptable values for the particular policy,
determine whether one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, and
in response to the determining,
if no other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, select the option, and
if one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, further execute the decision making software process for a next lower priority policy of the plurality of policies to consider the one or more other options, the decision making software process to continue to be executed for successively next lower priority policies until an option is selected.

claim-text.content: 11. An apparatus comprising:
one or more network interfaces;
a processor coupled to the one or more network interfaces and configured to execute software processes; and
a memory configured store a decision making software process executable by the processor, the decision making software process configured to:
ascertain a value for an option for a particular policy of a plurality of policies that are ranked in a priority order,
apply a variance to the value associated with the option for the particular policy to define a range of acceptable values for the particular policy,
determine whether one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, and
in response to the determining,
if no other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, select the option, and

if one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, further execute the decision making software process for a next lower priority policy of the plurality of policies to consider the one or more other options, the decision making software process to continue to be executed for successively next lower priority policies until an option is selected.

claim.body: each option is a path in the computer network.

content: , wherein each option is a path in the computer network.

claim.body: the plurality of policies are rules regarding selection of a best path.

content: , wherein the plurality of policies are rules regarding selection of a best path.

claim.body: the plurality of policies include one or more policies selected from the group consisting of: reachability, lowest round trip time, lowest packet loss, lowest cost, and lowest utilization.

content: , wherein the plurality of policies include one or more policies selected from the group consisting of: reachability, lowest round trip time, lowest packet loss, lowest cost, and lowest utilization.

claim.body:
the decision making software process is further configured to:
if there is not another lower priority policy, select one of the one or more other options as the selected option.

content: , wherein the decision making software process is further configured to:

claim-text.content: if there is not another lower priority policy, select one of the one or more other options as the selected option.

claim.body: the selection of one of the one or more other options as the selected option is by random selection.

content: , wherein the selection of one of the one or more other options as the selected option is by random selection.

claim.body: each policy of the plurality of policies is assigned a separate respective variance.

content: , wherein each policy of the plurality of policies is assigned a separate respective variance.

claim.body: the variance of at least one policy of the plurality of policies is a percentage value.

content: , wherein the variance of at least one policy of the plurality of policies is a percentage value.

claim.body: the apparatus is an Optimized Edge Router.

content: , wherein the apparatus is an Optimized Edge Router.

claim.body:
software that when executed is operable to:
ascertain a value for a path that may be selected by a particular path selection policy of a plurality of path selection policies that are ranked in a priority order;
apply a variance to the value to define a range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy;
determine whether one or more other paths exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy; and
in response to the determination,
select the path, if no other paths exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy, and
apply a next lower priority path selection policy of the plurality of path selection policies, if one or more other paths exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy.
claim.claim_preamble: One or more non-transitory computer readable media

claim-text.content: 20. One or more non-transitory computer readable media encoded with software that when executed is operable to:
ascertain a value for a path that may be selected by a particular path selection policy of a plurality of path selection policies that are ranked in a priority order;
apply a variance to the value to define a range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy;
determine whether one or more other paths exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy; and
in response to the determination,
select the path, if no other paths exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy, and

apply a next lower priority path selection policy of the plurality of path selection policies, if one or more other paths exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular path selection policy.
